title: Full of Energy!
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>No, no, no, no! Absolutely not!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Come on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Skateboarding is scary, you know! It hurts when you fall, and if Kasumin gets scraped up, it’d be terrible for Kasumin’s beautiful skin!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Kids grow up by getting hurt and learning from it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Go tell that to Mia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It seems like Mia-san wants to go though.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well, if she wants to go, that’s fine. But Kasumin doesn’t want to!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I see... I wanted to skateboard with Kasumi-san, though. I wanted to see a different kind of energetic cuteness from you while you’re on a skateboard...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Huh? Energetic cuteness...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Dripping sweat! A sparkly smile! Skateboarding beauty Kasumi-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>...If you put it like that...... I guess I could give it a try.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yay! I’m looking forward to skateboarding with Kasumi-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
